name: change
description: Emitted when the value of the input has changed after the user confirms or leaves the focus.

name: update:modelValue
description: Emitted when the value of the input has updated.

name: focus
description: Emitted when the input has been focused.

name: passwordChallengeCompleted
description: Emitted when the password challenge has been completed successfully.

name: passwordChallengeFailed
description: Emitted when the password challenge has failed.
